name: Surah Al Waqiah in Urdu
description: Surah Waqiah Urdu is a Smartphone Islamic Application, which is developed with the intentions to assist the Muslims towards better learning of sanctified chapter of Quran. This App facilitates native Muslims with easy to use features through Urdu translation, transliteration, and mp3 audio recitation to learn, recite, and read Surah Waqiah.  Main screen comprises complete Surah Waqiah, App description, Surah Yaseen with Urdu Translation and Surah Rahman with Urdu translation.  Other features include:   English translations of Surah Waqiah other than Urdu language  Recitation in the soulful voices of renowned recitors, Misharay Al-Afasy and Saad Al- Ghaamidi  Transliterations and audio recitations in mp3 format  Change of Font and Style for user convenient visibility  Alerts for the weekly notifications which is entirely upon user to enable or disable in settings options  Go To option for quick search and access of verses of Surah Al Waqiah  Reset, Play, share and save options  Download this imperative Application and learn to recite it with proper Tajweed in accordance to the rules of Quran.
